ComicInfo.Summary: Fastbender and Hertz discuss the possibilities of a coming war, but Fastbender won't give out any details. Meanwhile, Gary Danes and insults and demeans his host and other guests on yet another talk show while the Clown and Spawn face off one more time, with the Clown telling Al that basically, the battle will boil down to Al and his kind and the Clown and his.
ComicInfo.Title: Hate Me
